mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.userid AS "userId", a.procdefid AS "procDefId", a.procinsid AS "procInsId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.procdefname AS "procDefName", a.procinsname AS "procInsName", a.taskname AS "taskName", createBy.name AS "createBy.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO act_extension_cc( id, userid, procdefid, procinsid, create_date, create_by, procdefname, procinsname, taskname ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{userId}, #{procDefId}, #{procInsId}, #{createDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{procDefName}, #{procInsName}, #{taskName} )
